PageWidgetPortable.Title: Aprovar
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes:
<SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CN_CONTRATOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>( (A.STATUS = 1 AND A.LIBERADO = 'S') AND ( (A.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN(SELECT C.HANDLE FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES B,CP_GRUPOALCADAS C WHERE
B.GRUPO = C.HANDLE AND ((C.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (C.EHHIERARQUIA <> 'S' AND B.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND B.USUARIO = @USUARIO
AND B.ATIVO = 'S')) OR (A.GRUPODEASSINATURAS IN (SELECT D.GRUPO FROM CP_GRUPOALCADASUSUARIOS D, CP_GRUPOALCADASINTEGRANTES I,
CP_GRUPOALCADAS G WHERE D.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.GRUPO = G.HANDLE AND I.HANDLE = D.INTEGRANTE AND ((G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'S' AND I.SEQUENCIA >= A.SEQUENCIAALCADA) OR (G.EHHIERARQUIA = 'N' AND I.SEQUENCIA = A.SEQUENCIAALCADA)) AND D.USUARIOAUTORIZADO = @USUARIO AND I.USUARIO = D.USUARIO AND D.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.ATIVO = 'S' AND I.AUSENTE =
'S')) ) ) AND (A.TIPOCONTRATO IN(SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CN_TIPOSCONTRATOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = A.TIPOCONTRATO AND X.TIPO = 1 AND X.EHCONTRATOCONVENIO = 'N' ))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1907_at2637_hs192e9a75.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
